EH.Advancement.Core.Title: Custom Title
EH.Advancement.Confirmation.Label: Remove advancement changes
EH.Advancement.Confirmation.Message.Dele: Deleting this item will also delete all advancement choices made for it. These changes will be removed from your Hero as long as the checkbox below is checked.
EH.Advancement.Confirmation.Message.Leve: Leveling this Hero down will also undo all advancement choices made for it. These changes will be removed from your Hero as long as the checkbox below is checked.
EH.Advancement.Config.Title: Configure {item} Advancement
EH.Advancement.Config.Warning.Duplicate: That item already exists on this advancement.
EH.Advancement.Config.Warning.Recursive: You cannot grant an item in its own advancement.
EH.Advancement.Manager.Title: Advancement Manager
EH.Advancement.Manager.Close.Title: Stop Advancement
EH.Advancement.Manager.Close.Message: If the advancement process is cancelled, choices made so far will be discarded and no changes will be made to the hero.
EH.Advancement.Manager.Restart.Title: Restart Advancement Choices
EH.Advancement.Manager.Restart.Message: Are you sure you wish to undo all choices so far?
EH.Advancement.Selection.Title: Select Advancement Type
EH.Advancement.HitPoints.Title: Hit Points
EH.Advancement.HitPoints.Hint: Set an archetype's hit die size and track a player's hit points as they gain levels.

EH.Death.Message.CriticalSuccess: {name} critically succeeded on a death saving throw and has regained 1 Hit Point!
EH.Death.Message.Success: {name} has succeeded on {counted} and is now stable.
EH.Equipment.Category.Advanced.Label: Advanced
EH.Equipment.Category.Basic.Label: Basic

EH.Equipment.Category.Improvised.Label: Improvised
EH.Equipment.Category.Military.Label: Military
EH.Equipment.Traits.ArmorValue.Label: Armor Value
EH.Equipment.Traits.ArmorValue.Hint: Armor Value measures how well armor or a shield protects you against weapons.
EH.Equipment.Traits.Bulk.Label: Bulk
EH.Equipment.Traits.Bulk.Hint: Bulk provides an indicator for how heavy and/or unwieldy the item is.
EH.Equipment.Traits.Damage.Label: Damage
EH.Equipment.Traits.Damage.Hint: This is how much damage the weapon does before bonuses are applied, as well as what type of damage it deals.
EH.Equipment.Traits.Damage.Count.Label: Dice Count
EH.Equipment.Traits.Damage.Type.Label: Damage Type
EH.Equipment.Traits.PriceLevel.Label: Price Level
EH.Equipment.Traits.PriceLevel.Hint: Price level is a general measure of how expensive something is. If the price level is equal or lower than your Wealth Level, then you can buy the item freely.
EH.Equipment.Traits.Radius.Label: Radius
EH.Equipment.Traits.Radius.Hint: This value lists the blast radius for explosives, measured in feet. Each combatant in that radius is subject to the effects of the explosion.
EH.Equipment.Traits.Range.Label: Range
EH.Equipment.Traits.Range.Hint: This is the distance at which you can target a ranged weapon. If two numbers are listed, the second number is its long range. Attacks made at a distance farther than its range but within its long range have disadvantage on the attack roll.
EH.Equipment.Traits.Reload.Label: Reload
EH.Equipment.Traits.Reload.Hint: Reload tells you what type of action you need to reload a weapon: an action, bonus action, or free action.
EH.Equipment.Traits.Rounds.Label: Rounds
EH.Equipment.Traits.Rounds.Hint: This value shows how many rounds of ammunition you can fire before you must reload. Each time you fire the weapon, you use a number of rounds. Normally each attack uses a single round, but certain special attacks use more.
